function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive pandemic-sustainable indicators","Impact":"Inability to effectively assess and address pandemic risks in the built environment","Mitigation":"Develop and incorporate comprehensive pandemic-sustainable indicators into assessment systems","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, predictive modeling, sensor technology","People":"Building owners, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Building owners, urban planners, public health officials"},{"Description":"Focus on current state rather than future states","Impact":"Failure to anticipate and prepare for future pandemic challenges in the built environment","Mitigation":"Include future-oriented risk assessments in addition to current state analysis","Technologies":"Scenario planning tools, trend analysis models, forecasting software","People":"Risk analysts, urban designers, policymakers","Owner":"Urban designers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Calculation of gap levels for pandemic-sustainable indicators","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of the extent of gaps in pandemic readiness for built environments","Mitigation":"Validate the gap calculation methodology and adjust for accuracy","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, statistical analysis software, dashboard applications","People":"Risk analysts, data scientists, public health experts","Owner":"Risk analysts, data scientists, public health experts"}]}
